main.sql: select fr.* , loc.* , (select squat from bestsquatbyloc(fr.loc)) as best_squat , (select bench from bestbenchbyloc(fr.loc)) as best_bench , (select DL from bestdlbyloc1(fr.loc)) as best_deadlift , r.sname sdivis , r.name fdivis , r.kind , le.bench1 , le.bench2 , le.summaall as totall from absolute_gram(%IDC%) fr inner join Lifter_on_competition loc on fr.loc=loc.id_lifter_compet inner join Competit c on c.id_compet = loc.id_compet inner join Range r on r.id_range=c.id_range left join lifter_exersis le on loc.id_lifter_compet = le.id_lifter_compet
